title: Jamestown Museum Typeface
content:
Hi. First post at Typophile.

I was wandering around the Jamestown VA museum last week and this typeface was used all over the informational boards but I can’t identify it. The 4 is throwing me off. Anyone got any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011051im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_2798_5546.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DSC\_2798.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011051/http:/typophile.com/files/DSC_2798.jpg) | 28.18 KB |

author: abbottdr
